metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7227 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
GNU linker (ld) in GNU Binutils 2.28 is vulnerable to a heap-based bufferoverflow while processing a bogus input script, leading to a program crash.This relates to lack of '\0' termination of a name field in ldlex.l.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
